General.Name: Jean Co Ltd
General.Description: Jean Co.,Ltd engages in the design, manufacture, and marketing of computer and TV display products in Taiwan. It also imports and exports electronic parts; and constructs, develops, sells, and leases real estate properties. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 300, Yang Guang St., Taipei, Taiwan, 114
